title: Welcome to Pavel’s Profile
text:
I’m Pavel, a PhD candidate in Public Affairs at the University of Texas at Dallas. My research focuses on collaborative governance, Human Resources, Non-profit management, and Public Administration.
This site highlights my academic work, including research interests, publications, and ongoing projects.



Collaborative Governance
Human Resources
Non-profit Management
Public Administration




Book Review
The Politics of Collaborative Public Management: A Primer by Robert Agranoff and Aleksey Kolpakov
Published by Routledge, 2023.
- DOI: 10.1111/padm.12990
- Volume 102, Issue 2, June 2024, Pages 791-793.

title: About Me
text:
I’m a PhD student at the University of Texas at Dallas, specializing in Public Affairs. My research interests revolve around collaborative governance, Human Resources, Non-profit management, and Public Administration.



Md Eyasin Ul Islam Pavel (2024). Book Review:

Published in Public Administration, Volume 102, Issue 2, Pages 791-793.
